kv17.10:5.4: Nanu bhagavā dvipadānaṃ aggo, dvipadānaṃ seṭṭho, dvipadānaṃ pamokkho, dvipadānaṃ uttamo, dvipadānaṃ pavaro asamo asamasamo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti?
kv17.10:5.6: Hañci bhagavā dvipadānaṃ aggo, dvipadānaṃ seṭṭho, dvipadānaṃ pamokkho, dvipadānaṃ uttamo, dvipadānaṃ pavaro asamo asamasamo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.10:6.8: sīlena samādhinā paññāya, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.10:8.2: Buddhena seṭṭho ca samo ca vijjati;
kv17.10:10.1: Na vattabbaṃ buddhassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathā niṭṭhitā.
